name: 2.4.3.Final
body:
- [**closed**] Fix apicurio-client-gen download link [#3333](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3333)
- [**Bug**][**area/ui**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] Inconsistent validation behavior between UI and REST API [#3314](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3314)
- [**Enhancement**] APICurio library with Java 17 [#3310](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3310)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**] [/apis/ccompat/v6] Failed to create/retrieve schema `hm.motor-value` (`hm.motor` succeed) [#3309](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3309)
- [**Bug**][**area/ui**][**area/storage**] Anonymous read access via UI not working [#3307](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3307)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] createdOn deserialize error with datestrings ending with 'Z' (UTC) [#3301](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3301)
- [**Question**][**area/ccompat-api**] Compatibility Apicurio Confluent-Kafka Python libraries.  [#3292](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3292)
- [**Bug**][**area/compatibility**][**area/rest-api**][**area/storage**][**area/rules**] apicurio/apicurio-registry-sql:2.4.2.Final fails to start on RedHat OpenShift [#3288](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3288)
- [**area/storage**] KSQL storage: unable to start up Apicurio 2.4.2 with schema references [#3287](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3287)
- [**Bug**] Direct access grant for 2.4.2 [#3285](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3285)
- [**Enhancement**] Support Java 17 [#3283](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3283)
- [**area/storage**] Docker-compose integration with Keycloak.  [#3277](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3277)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] SSL peer shut down incorrectly error when I execute 'clean install' [#3267](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3267)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/storage**] Make the Key Password optional when configuring kafkasql TLS [#3260](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3260)
- [**area/storage**] Can not using Basic-authentication with Python Apicurio Registry Client. [#3259](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3259)
- [**Enhancement**][**area/storage**] possible to run  apicurio-registry-mssql container without root permissions ; userid>999 [#3258](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3258)
- [**Documentation**][**priority/normal**][**area/storage**] Document minimal permisions for kafkasql topic [#3238](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3238)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/serdes**] Support resolving schemas by content hash in  [#3237](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3237)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/references**] Extended support for artifact references in the Maven plugin [#3103](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3103)
- [**area/ui**] Implement artifact reference support in the Registry UI [#3102](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/3102)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] SSL configuration does not work unless SASL is enabled [#2938](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2938)
- [**Bug**][**area/storage**] Registering Avro schemas via ccompat API may cause Syntax Error depending on field order [#2930](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2930)
- [**Bug**][**area/rest-api**][**area/ccompat-api**] Setting "registry.ccompat.use-canonical-hash" changes schema to canonized form on save [#2902](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2902)
- [**Bug**][**area/references**] Avro deserialization error when using io.confluent.kafka.serializers.KafkaAvroDeserializer [#2878](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2878)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**][**area/auth**] REFRESH_TOKEN_ERROR with Keycloak Integration [#2816](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2816)
- [**UI**][**area/ui**] Update change owner UI to only display accounts with access to the instance  [#2769](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2769)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**area/auth**] Support auth proxies by enabling reading of roles from HTTP headers [#2745](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2745)
- [**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Check in CI that the source code generated from `openapi.json` is in sync [#2656](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2656)
- [**Discussion**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] Apicurio-registry Keycloak integration giving 500 error ("/apis/registry/v2/users/me") after login and Apicurio registry page not loading [#2643](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2643)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Implement reference-related rules [#2594](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2594)
- [**Bug**][**component/registry**][**priority/high**] KafkaSQL storage log compaction bug and ccompat/v6 API [#2520](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2520)
- [**Enhancement**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Support apicurio.registry.headers.enabled in connect-converter [#2461](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2461)
- [**Task**][**component/registry**][**priority/normal**] Test registry export/import from RHI-SR to RHOSR [#2351](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/2351)
- [**closed**] multitenancy: context is not cleared out when passing tenantId via header or via domain name [#1912](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1912)
- [**closed**] Time out waiting for node assignment [#1853](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1853)
- [**closed**] Add Sentry support [#1829](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1829)
- [**closed**] Avro Producer considers "avro.java.string" as part of the schema comparations [#1592](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1592)
- [**Enhancement**] Implementing max size requests on upload [#1366](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/1366)
- [**Enhancement**] Add mongodb support [#935](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/935)
- [**Enhancement**] Support custom/pluggable compatibility and validation logic [#761](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/761)
- [**Question**] Guidance on running multiple instances? [#751](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/751)
- [**Enhancement**][**2.0.x**] Add support for running registry in read-only mode [#637](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/637)
- [**Task**][**Tests**] Set up test env for apicurio-registry-utils-kafka module [#620](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/620)
- [**closed**] tests - unstable KafkaConnectConverterIT [#568](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/568)
- [**Discussion**] Use more light-weight design for converter client [#390](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/390)
